bib.title: English Translator$\pm$A Bi directional Polish English Translation System
bib.author: {\L}abuzek, Marek and Piasecki, Maciej
bib.abstract: The paper presents the structure of a biadirectional PolishaEnglish machine translation system. Since it was created mostly as a commercial proda uct, such aspects as speed of translation, dealing with ungrammatical texts and time and cost of developing the system are of big importance. An attempt of solving these problems by the application of Machine Learning techniques in parsing and tagging is discussed.
